parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if a location is rectangular (returns true) or elliptical (returns false).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''rectangular''' location

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isRect = [[rectangular]] myLocation;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setText]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearestLocations]], [[locationPosition]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[setRectangular]], [[createLocation]]
</value></part></template>
